Articles.Content:
Hello everyone !

 

Since the update to 1.4 it became impossible for me to play on the 64bits

so I decided to play on the 32bits version which led me to memory problems :  forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/172822-ksp-141-crash-too-often

 

The reason why I can't launch KSP 64bits is when I launch the game, I just get a black screen, with the loading bar already at 50% done at nothing happen..

The window is not broken... just seems like the 64 bits have to display this image : 

Album 4tp4h will appear when post is submitted

 

What I tried :

- Launching the game as admin

- Verify the games files integrity

 

If you have already experienced this or have any tips to give me, you're welcome

Edited March 23, 2018 by PrimoDev
Problem fixed

Finally fixed, as it was coming from the exe

I deleted it, and steam downloaded it for me and now everything working !
